Package model

Class PodcastModel

java.lang.Object
model.PodcastModel
public class PodcastModel extends Object
The model of the Podcast Manager application that handles the bulk of work dealing with the managing of files, and their settings. This includes downloading files from the internet, the file path of where to download these files, the loading, pausing, playing, volume changes, and time stamp locations of these files, as well as the parsing of them to gain various pieces of information from them.
Author:
Akli Amrous, Rhys Davis, Joey Enslen, John Fourchy

  • Method Details

    • loadNewMedia

      public void loadNewMedia​(File audio_file)
      Loads a new audio file as the current podcast being played.
      Parameters:
      audio_file - - the new audio file to load

    • playAudio

      public void playAudio()
      Plays the audio file.

    • pauseAudio

      public void pauseAudio()
      Pauses the audio file.

    • getMediaStatus

      public String getMediaStatus()
      Returns the current status of the audio file, whether it is currently being played or not. Returns "playing" if the audio file is playing, and "paused" if the audio file is paused.
      Returns:
      the current status of the audio file

    • fastForward

      public void fastForward()
      Skips ahead by 10 seconds in the audio file.

    • rewind

      public void rewind()
      Skips backwards by 10 seconds in the audio file.

    • volumeUp

      public void volumeUp()
      Increases the volume by .1, up to a max of 1.

    • volumeDown

      public void volumeDown()
      Decreases the volume by .1, to a minimum of 0.

    • getCurrentVolume

      public double getCurrentVolume()
      Returns the current volume of the audio file.
      Returns:
      a decimal value representation of the volume of the audio file

    • setPlaybackSpeed

      public void setPlaybackSpeed()
      Sets the playback speed of the audio file. This represents how fast the audio file is being played, compared to its normal speed. 1.0 being the normal speed and anything higher being a faster playback speed.

    • getPlaybackSpeed

      public String getPlaybackSpeed()
      Returns the playback speed of the audio file as a string.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the playback speed of the file

    • downloadFile

      public String downloadFile​(Episode episode) throws IOException
      Downloads an episode of a podcast and returns the location it was downloaded to. Downloads a file located at the episode->mp3URL field and downloads it on your local machine in the fDEFAULT_PATH folder, with the same name as the episode->title field.
      Parameters:
      episode - - the episode to download
      Returns:
      the file path of the location of the downloaded file
      Throws:
      IOException - - if the URL cannot be connected to or the download is interrupted

    • setDefaultPath

      public void setDefaultPath​(String path)
      Sets the default path to download files to.
      Parameters:
      path - - the new file location specifying where to download files

    • getInitialDefaultPath

      public String getInitialDefaultPath()
      Gets the initial default file path to allow the user to browse their computer for podcast files. This gives different initial default paths based on the operating system the user is using.
      Returns:
      the initial default file path of a users files

    • parseRSSFile

      public ArrayList<Episode> parseRSSFile​(File file)
      Parses a passed in xml / rss file and creates an arrayList of episodes, with each episode in the podcast being stored in the arrayList. Assumes that we can use the XML Parser library. Ideal Usage: Can create a Podcast object with this array as the constructor argument.
      Parameters:
      file - - the name of the xml file to parse
      Returns:
      an arrayList of episode objects.
